text: Walter Pidgeon (September 23, 1897 â€“ September 25, 1984) was a Canadian actor. He was born in Saint John, New Brunswick, Canada. He starred in many movies, including Forbidden Planet. He died in Santa Monica, California on September 25, 1984, two days after his 87th birthday. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Presidents of the Screen Actors Guild Category:Canadian movie actors Category:Canadian stage actors Category:Canadian television actors Category:1897 births Category:1984 deaths
